translation.en: [sighs] I think you need a very quick beat that's also a little screamy
translation.zh:
‎我想你需要快节奏的
‎同时又有点儿尖叫的

translation.en: because it's like going to boot camp. It's like, "Go!" [screams]
translation.zh: ‎因为这就像去训练营 “加油！快！”

translation.en: -How many of these you go through? -Thousands of them.
translation.zh:
‎-你们能卖出多少？
‎-好几千个

translation.en: On a week, we probably sell eight to ten thousand cake truffles.
translation.zh: ‎一周我们能卖八千到一万个蛋糕球

translation.en: [Jon] Really?
translation.zh: ‎真的？

translation.en: So this is that birthday crumb with a little bit more chocolate.
translation.zh:
‎这是刚才的生日面包屑
‎还有点巧克力

translation.en: And we broke it down to a sandy.
translation.zh:
‎-好
‎-我们把它碾碎成沙

translation.en: This is white chocolate that is mixed with a little bit of oil
translation.zh: ‎这是白巧克力 和油搅拌好了

translation.en: so that it's nice and thin.
translation.zh:
‎-稀稠正合适
‎-好

translation.en: [Christina] We're gonna white chocolate hands,
translation.zh: ‎我们把白巧克力涂在手上

translation.en: -throw it over to Roy. -[Jon] Fried chicken.
translation.zh:
‎-扔给罗伊
‎-炸鸡

translation.en: [Christina] Roy is going to rake it and then pull it.
translation.zh: ‎罗伊让它在里面滚几个滚 再取出来

translation.en: -And then as soon as it sets… -[Jon] Warm.
translation.zh:
‎-等它定型了…
‎-热的

translation.en: …it's ready to eat or ready to package.
translation.zh: ‎-…就可以吃或者封装了

translation.en: It's chocolate, vanilla, and a truffle.
translation.zh: ‎用到了巧克力、香草 做成松露球

translation.en: So you can get some really primo bake-sale vibe.
translation.zh: ‎感觉是很高级的烘焙食品

translation.en: Taste some of it.
translation.zh: ‎尝尝

translation.en: The second this sets,
translation.zh: ‎一定型

translation.en: there's a little of that shard of texture of white chocolate.
translation.zh: ‎白巧克力就会形成一层脆皮

translation.en: -This one's gonna be a hit. -That one's gonna be a hit.
translation.zh: ‎一定很受欢迎 ‎一定很受欢迎

translation.en: [Roy] So we have our bake sale now.
translation.zh: ‎我们的烘焙义卖产品准备好了

translation.en: [Jon] You'd get that new library--
translation.zh: ‎你们学校很快就可以盖起一座

translation.en: [Christina] In my imagination, this is what a bake sale should look like.
translation.zh:
‎-新图书馆了
‎-烘焙义卖应该是这个样子 ‎对

translation.en: You show up to a bake sale with that, you got two secret weapons.
translation.zh:
‎你带着它去参加烘焙义卖
‎你有两件秘密武器

translation.en: All of a sudden, you're in a different realm.
translation.zh: ‎你立刻就与众不同了

translation.en: -You're in a different territory. -[Roy] You're parent of the year.
translation.zh:
‎-超凡脱俗了
‎-你可能会当选年度模范家长

translation.en: [Jon] Lightning round. If I go to the ice cream parlor, I'll get vanilla.
translation.zh: ‎快速问答 ‎如果我去冰淇淋店 我会点香草的

translation.en: [Christina] I'm a vanilla-ice-cream person.
translation.zh:
‎-我也喜欢香草冰淇淋
‎-是的

translation.en: [Roy] For ice cream, vanilla milkshake, chocolate.
translation.zh: ‎吃冰淇淋的话 香草奶昔、巧克力

translation.en: -[Jon] Really? -[Roy] The problem growing up is my mom
translation.zh: ‎真的？ ‎问题是 我小时候 妈妈总是用

translation.en: -used the same blender for kimchi. -[Jon] Acid. You want acid.
translation.zh:
‎做辣白菜的搅拌器给我做奶昔 ‎-你需要一点酸味
‎-对 酸味

translation.en: -[Christina] A little funk. -[all laugh]
translation.zh:
‎-那就是我的…
‎-有股怪味 ‎字幕翻译：Zeo Niu
